info.title: Order Management API
info.description: This API handles the management of customer orders

get.description: Returns a paginated list of catalogs with their total meters

post.description: Creates a new catalog with a name and price

get.description: Returns a specific catalog by its ID

parameters.name: catalog
parameters.description: ID of the catalog to retrieve

put.description: Updates a catalog's name or price

parameters.name: catalog
parameters.description: ID of the catalog to update

parameters.name: catalog
parameters.description: ID of the catalog to delete

get.description: Search for catalogs by name or price
Retrieves a paginated list of colors for a specific catalog by its ID

parameters.name: catalogId
parameters.description: ID of the catalog for which colors are to be retrieved

post.description: Adds multiple colors to a specific catalog by its ID

parameters.name: catalogId
parameters.description: ID of the catalog to which colors will be added

post.description: Updates the quantities of multiple colors for a specific catalog by its ID

parameters.name: catalogId
parameters.description: ID of the catalog for which colors are to be updated

data.description: List of colors with their quantities to update

get.description: Returns a paginated list of customers with their details

post.description: Creates a new customer with the provided details

get.description: Returns a specific customer by their ID

parameters.name: customerId
parameters.description: ID of the customer to retrieve

post.description: Updates an existing customer's details by their ID

parameters.name: customerId
parameters.description: ID of the customer to update

delete.description: Deletes a customer by their ID

parameters.name: customerId
parameters.description: ID of the customer to delete

get.description: Search for customers by various fields such as name, email, country, etc.

get.summary: Get orders for a specific customer
get.description: Retrieve a paginated list of orders for a given customer, including order details and calculated totals.

parameters.name: customerId
parameters.description: The ID of the customer for whom the orders are being retrieved.

200.description: List of orders for the specified customer.

post.summary: Create a new order for a customer
post.description: Create a new order for a specific customer, including order details and items.

parameters.name: customerId
parameters.description: The ID of the customer for whom the order is being created.

get.summary: Get details of a specific customer's order
get.description: Retrieve the details of a specific order for a customer by providing customer ID and order ID.

delete.description: Delete a specific order based on CustomerId and OrderId.

parameters.name: CustomerId
parameters.description: ID of the customer who owns the order.

parameters.name: OrderId
parameters.description: ID of the order to be deleted.

post.description: Update details of an existing order including its items.

parameters.name: orderId
parameters.description: The ID of the order to update.

get.description: Retrieve a paginated list of orders with their customer and item details.

get.summary: Search orders within a date range
get.description: Retrieve orders placed between the specified start date and end date.

parameters.name: start_date
parameters.description: Start date for the search (format: YYYY-MM-DD)

parameters.name: end_date
parameters.description: End date for the search (format: YYYY-MM-DD)

400.description: Payment amount exceeds the total order amount

message.example: Payment amount exceeds the total order amount

get.summary: Get customer statement by customer ID

404.description: No orders found for this customer

message.example: No orders found for this customer

post.description: Update the email address of the currently authenticated user.

Email.description: New email address for the user.

items.example: The Email has already been taken.

post.description: Allow the authenticated user to change their current password.

new_password.description: New password for the user. Must be at least 6 characters long.

items.example: The current password field is required.
The new password field is required.

post.summary: Add phone number to user profile
post.description: Allow the authenticated user to add or update their phone number.

PhoneNumber.description: The phone number to be added or updated.

post.description: Authenticates a user and returns an access token
Registers a new user with email and password

example: The PasswordHash confirmation does not match.

post.description: Logs out the currently authenticated user and invalidates their token

get.description: Retrieve the profile information of the currently authenticated user

post.description: Send a password reset link to the user's email.

message.example: Password reset link sent to your email.

post.description: Reset the user's password using the token sent to their email.
Update the role of a user. The role will be assigned to the user based on the provided role name.

userId.description: ID of the user whose role is to be updated

role.description: Name of the role to be assigned

404.description: Role not found or User not found
